Recipe.Description: White butter sauce. This is basically beurre mont√© with additional flavoring. This is the same stuff you get at restaurants, variously called 'wine and butter sauce' or 'lemon butter sauce', etc., depending on the flavoring ingredient. Follow the directions for beurre monte, but substitute a flavored liquid for the water; lemon juice, white wine, clam juice, vinegar, cognac, Grand Mariner, etc.

Method.Step: Heat water or flavorful liquid in a pan.
Whisk butter into the liquid, a tablespoon at a time.
